about_the_game:
This pack will add Nagae Iku and Tatara Kogasa to the game.

================================================================

Nagae Iku

Beautiful Scarlet Cloth

  • Primary attack: Firing off lightning sparks that will bounce among enemies.
  • Secondary attack: Knock back enemies with a drill.
  • Bomb: Summon thunder to attack all enemies with "conductive" status.
  • Dodge: A normal dash
  • Characteristic: Iku's attack will inflict "conductive" status to enemies.

================================================================

Tatara Kogasa

The Cheery Forgotten Umbrella

  • Primary attack: Kogasa fires danmaku by swinging her umbrella.
  • Secondary attack: Kogasa blocks danmaku with her umbrella.
  • Bomb: Kogasa spins her umbrella, and fire danmaku around her.
  • Dash: A normal dash
  • Characteristic: As a defence oriented character, Kogasa is able to block most danmaku.
